scene_plan.description: A wide aerial shot capturing the vast and untouched landscape of Cappadocia with a solitary horseman standing atop a rocky outcropping. The scene is bathed in natural sunlight to emphasize its timeless beauty.

A closer shot focusing on the interaction between the horseman and his horse against the backdrop of snow-covered rocks. The dynamic is captured with a handheld camera to add realism in an otherwise still environment.
A shot from above showing intricate patterns formed by natural rock formations and the horseman's position within them. This perspective reveals details not visible at ground level.

sora_prompt.voiceover: <VoiceOver line based ONLY on facts>: 'In the heart of Cappadocia, a solitary horseman stands atop ancient rocks in silent communion with nature. Discover new perspectives and patterns from above.' Comment below.
